243240.name: Faceless
243240.description:
"Family is important, wouldn't you agree?"


Faceless is a pre-apocalyptic supernatural mystery set around a cursed city and an unearthly creature known as The Soulrender. Players must work together to gather a series of dolls and set the souls within free, whilst also attempting to survive the wounded yet powerful threat that lurks.

Four friends must enter Wakeland City to search for Daniel North, but when they learn that the city is full of Dolls that have souls trapped within them, they decide to heed Daniel North's directions on delivering the Dolls to the Ritual Zones around the city as a means to drive the Soulrender away. Discover hidden clues from Daniel North, Elijah Grey, and Henry North in the form of digital/cassette recordings to learn what caused the infamous 'Bear Valley Tragedy'.

Faceless Short Stories

These short stories expand upon the world of Faceless.

The Sorrowvirus - Journey into Purgatory as Wyatt struggles to set himself free from his torment at the hands of his parents.

Beyond The Shell - Explore the fallout of the Bear Valley Tragedy as the ghost of Cassandra Noble, and attempt to free her soul from the confines of one of the Soulrender's dolls.

Secondborn - Witness the birth of the Soulrender mere hours before 'Beyond The Shell'. As Wendy Mason, explore the facility of Precipice before it became known as Heyll.

Whispers of Wakeland - Endeavour to find Daniel North as Elijah Grey, venturing to the outskirts of Wakeland City, uncovering the deep, dark secrets of the Fallen Grace Church & Asylum.

The Perishing of Daniel North - Fall to Purgatory one last time as Daniel North, a hard-of-hearing survivor whose hearing-aid batteries run out in this unnatural, world-bending environment.
